title: Discovery Drive
content: Continental’s Travel Companion aggregates driver and passenger preferences, as well as real-time social travel trend data to craft personalized travel experiences that help users discover new sites, spots and scenes in their city and beyond.

title: Adapt-to-Me
content: Continental’s Travel Companion is a highly adaptable system that constantly monitors the vehicle’s interior and exterior environments to create a truly delightful and custom HMI experience that grows with users in closeness and capability over time.

title: Mobile Me Time
content: Continental’s Travel Companion transforms the vehicle into a mobile rejuvenation center, using biometric data, driving behaviors, schedules and more to offer custom integrated wellness experiences designed to relax even the most stressed driver.

title: Custom Characters
content: Continental’s Travel Companion initiates a collaborative process in which drivers create a unique Companion character that acts as a co-pilot, offering a hyper-personalized and interactive automotive experience.

title: Mobile Memories
content: Continental’s Travel Companion leverages internal and exterior cameras, audio and lighting to collect, create and recall memorable moments experienced in and around the vehicle.

title: Hidden AR Worlds
content: Continental’s Travel Companion utilizes augmented reality (AR), paired with real-world geo-location information, mood detection and personal preferences to create fixed, virtual “hidden worlds” experienced along daily or common routes.
